titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the nature and grounds of the certainty of faith in answer to J.S., his Catholick letters / by Edw. Stillingfleet ...
titleStmt.author: Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.

notesStmt.note: A reply to John Sergeant's Letter, 1687, and others of his works.
Half-title: Dr. Stillingfleet's answer to J.S.'s Catholick letters.
Another copy bound with Stillingfleet's A letter to Mr. G., 1687.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library.
